extendedInfo.description: Follow the story of Hector and his wife Michelle as they drive to Pale Stone Forest while they imagine how good it is to be out of the city for a change.Which mystery lingers there? Is it true what they say about that place? Will the couple get out of this nightmare alive?To find out what happens to them ... you know what you have to do ... This story contains scary surprises and eerie sounds - it is advised that you wear headphones while playing it.The estimated story time for this chapter is around 30-60 minutes.Give Ghost Town a try and send us your feedback! It's free.Thanks for downloading Ghost Town and we hope that you'll enjoy the story.Ghost Town: Chapter 2 is now available here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dema.GhostTownChapter2keywords: ghost town, adventure, role playing, choose your own adventure, interactive fiction, visual novel

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed the store can\'t wait for chapter 2
reviews.author: John Guffey
